title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 Available Now with Game Pass

html:
Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 is now live! Drop into the next iteration of the legendary skateboarding series today, featuring dozens of skaters and tricks, nineteen parks, cross-platform multiplayer, expanded Create-A-Park and Create-A-Skater features, and more.

Today is the day: Grab your board and get ready to shred with the official launch of Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4, now live on PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Battle.net, Steam, Microsoft PC Store). Play it today with Game Pass*.

Brought to you by the developers at Iron Galaxy Studios, Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4features classic and new parks, skaters, and tricks alongside enhanced customization and creation tools, more quality-of-life features, cross-platform multiplayer, and more. For a deeper look at all the features on board, check out our Ramp Up to Launch, Soundtrack, and Customization and Accessibility Overview articles. For those eager to get into the grind, here are the main highlights: 

Pick Your Skater or Make Your Own

Select from more than two dozen skaters, including 21 returning skaters, eight new skaters, and a handful of secret skaters all ready to shred.

OG Skaters: Tony Hawk, Bob Burnquist, Bucky Lasek, Steve Caballero, Kareem Campbell, Geoff Rowley, Andrew Reynolds, Elissa Steamer, Chad Muska, Eric Koston, Rodney Mullen, Jamie Thomas, Rune Glifberg, Aori Nishimura, Leo Baker, Leticia Bufoni, Lizzie Armanto, Nyah Huston, Riley Hawk, Shane O’Neill, Tyshawn Jones

New Skaters: Jamie Foy, Yuto Horigome, Nora Vasconcellos, Zion Wright, Chloe Covell, Rayssa Leal, Margielyn Didal, Aurélien Giraud

Revealed Secret Skaters: Andy Anderson, Bam Margera, Constable Richard, Michaelangelo

Digital Deluxe Edition Skaters: Doom Slayer, Revenant

Create-A-Skater

Start by choosing your name, hometown, skater style, stance, and push style, then dig into your unique skater with customization options for the face, skin tone, hair style, eye color, makeup, facial hair, tattoos, and voice. Gear up with a variety of apparel options and style your board by selecting a graphic, grip tape, wear, trucks, and wheels. Perfect your look and start skating!

Shred Classic and New Parks

Hit up two Career Tours, drop into high score runs in Single Session, beat your goal time in a Speedrun, or ditch the timer and head into Free Skate. Test your abilities across a total of 19 parks, including remakes of Foundry, Canada, Rio, Suburbia, Airport, Skater Island, Los Angeles, Tokyo, Cruise Ship, College, San Francisco, Alcatraz, Kona, Shipyard, London, and Zoo.

Experience three brand-new parks, too; see what you’re up against with our previews of Waterpark, Movie Studio, and Pinball.

New Game+: Intent on truly mastering the extreme sport? Head into a new playthrough after completing the game for the first time, retaining the stats you’ve earned while tackling legacy goals and new objectives like Pro Goals and Expert Challenges. Plus, learn the ins and outs of individual skaters with Solo Tours.

Build and Share with Create-A-Park

Got your own ideas for the perfect skatepark? Head into Create-A-Park, featuring deep customization with powerful tools and dozens of objects and obstacles including dynamic content and custom goals. Share your dream park with other skaters and play and rate other players’ parks.

Bring the Crew in Multiplayer

Hang out with your friends in Free Skate or get competitive with a variety of game modes including Trick Attack, Score Challenge, Combo Mambo, Combo Challenge, Graffiti, and the brand-new Hawk mode. Multiplayer allows up to eight skaters at a time with support for cross-platform, private, and local play. Local multiplayer matches can additionally choose from the game modes Horse and Tag. 

Get the Digital Deluxe Edition

Shred the parks and spread fear as the Doom Slayer and Revenant skaters plus get extra music, skate decks, and Create-A-Skater gear:

  • Doom Slayer: He’s a badass demon-hunting space marine who loves to rip and tear, which makes him no stranger to shredding.
  • Revenant: Revenants are UAC Military operatives, transformed into cool skateboarders through cybernetic augmentation and Lazarus Wave exposure.
  • Additional Music: Rock out to a selection of classic and modern music tracks added to the in-game soundtrack.
  • Skate Decks: Access additional skate decks including Doom Slayer and Revenant themed designs.
  • Create-A-Skater Items: Kit out your skater with additional apparel items, including a baseball cap, two sweatshirts, and two T-shirts.

Purchase THPS 3 + 4 Today

Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 is now available for purchase on PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC. For more information, visit tonyhawkthegame.com.

*Available with Game Pass Ultimate or PC Game Pass.

** Activision account and internet required for online multiplayer and other features. Platform gaming subscription may be required for multiplayer and other features (sold separately)
